en: A Four-Day Split Workout targets different muscle groups each session, balancing strength, recovery, and growth for efficient training.
Muscle Groups Targeted፦ Chest, Back, Shoulders, Triceps, Biceps
Muscle Groups Targeted፦ Quadriceps, Hamstrings, Glutes, Calves
Muscle Groups Targeted፦ Back, Chest, Shoulders, Biceps
Muscle Groups Targeted፦ Hamstrings, Glutes, Quadriceps, Calves, Core
